episodes.title: Nobody with Natural Straight Hair Can Be That Bad/Nobody with Straight Blond Hair Can Be That Good
episodes.plot: Gintama returns home after a vacation, to find that he has been replaced with Kintama, a golden-haired warrior who is his superior in every way and has made everyone forget about him.

episodes.title: Kintoki and Gintoki
episodes.plot: Gintoki sets out to reclaim his life from Kintoki.

episodes.title: Kin-san's Kintama
episodes.plot: Kintoki has turned Gintoki's friends against him. Can he get them back and stop them trying to kill him?

episodes.title: The Meaning of a Main Character
episodes.plot: Gintoki and Kintoki face off to see whose show gets to continue.

episodes.title: Courtesan Turns the Tables
episodes.plot: An elderly courtesan longs to see her lover again, prompting Gintoki to go on a quest.

episodes.title: Inside the Palace!!
episodes.plot: The gang gets thrown in prison, where they learn of Suzuran's tragic love story.

episodes.title: Five Pinkies
episodes.plot: The Yoroyuza gang makes it to the palace, but a dark secret from Gintoki's past derails things.

episodes.title: Pinky Swear
episodes.plot: The current Shogun puts a stop to the whole brouhaha, but Gintoki wants vengeance.

episodes.title: Unsetting Moon
episodes.plot: It's the last night of Suzuran's life. Will Gintoki reunite her with her lover in time?

episodes.title: Sound of a Beam Can Pierce Every Heart
episodes.plot: Tae visit her father's grave, then a guy calls out to her back. He is Hajime Obi, the former school manager of Koudoukan. His whereabouts have been unknown since he got involved in a explosion at the terminal several years ago. Tae and Shinpachi with surprised delight, and warmly invite him into their house.

episodes.title: Two Brothers
episodes.plot: To catch the secret of Obi, Gintoki confronts him before Tae and Shinpachi are aware of it.

episodes.title: Liquor and Gasoline, Smiles and Tears
episodes.plot: Shinpachi faces the fact that Obi is not the one he used to be. As successor of the Tendoumushin school, he fights against Obi.

episodes.title: Dog Food Doesn't Have as Much Flavor as You'd Think
episodes.plot: Gintoki and Kagura eat dog food because Yorozuya have had financial difficulties in living. Sadaharu gets angry, and leave home.
